name: Both Sides (KD42)
description:
Try to last as long as possible without touching an opposite colour!

- Finish tasks and destroy targets, if needed, to advance to the next stage

- Every stage after the previous one increases the difficulty

- Try to complete as many stages as you can

If help is needed,  refer to the info symbol with a question mark in the Main Menu which will give you some instructions to how the stages work and what your objectives are.
